original_title: Spending the War Without You: Virtual Backgrounds - The Road
overview: Laurie Anderson presents Spending the War Without You: Virtual Backgrounds. The Road is the fourth in a series of six lectures, looking at the challenges we face as artists and citizens as we reinvent our culture with ambiguity and beauty. The talk will consider technology, media hypnosis, radio, speed and invention.
title: Spending the War Without You: Virtual Backgrounds - The Road
